# SAFER+ (SAFER plus)
SAFER+ algorithm implementation using Python.

The program code's comments are in Ukrainian üá∫üá¶.
It should be noted that there are several inaccuracies (errors) in the logic of the encryption algorithm implementation.

Example:
========================
Run code:
